product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaDiamond Bomb All-Over Diamond Veil
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeFENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna's Diamond Bomb All-Over Diamond Veil is a one-of-a-kind diamond-dusted highlighter that applies like a 3D glittering veil, delivering pure, show-stopping sparkle all over the face and body.
details: DetailsBenefitsSuperfine 3D sparkle for face & bodyInsane diamond-dusted effectUnique jelly-like powder that's bouncy, cool to the touch and melts into skinAll-glitz-no-grit finish that looks incredible on all skin tonesFaceted jewel-like compact that you'll never want to put downItem 2643931How To UseApply using the Face & Body Kabuki Brush 160 all over the body for a dazzling glitter finish with serious depth and dimension. And remember - a little goes a long way!IngredientsPolymethylsilsesquioxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Mica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Calcium Carbonate, Pentylene Glycol, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Tin Oxide, Polyisobutene, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carmine (CI 75470).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply using the Face & Body Kabuki Brush 160 all over the body for a dazzling glitter finish with serious depth and dimension. And remember - a little goes a long way!

reviews.headline: Stunning
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product! super easy to use and the finished product is unreal! highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Twinkling Eyes
reviews.comments: The color, Pink Ice (Diamond Bomb All-over Diamond Vale) is absolutely beautiful.  I wear it alone during the day as eyeshadow.  I didn't think it would be noticeable behind my prescription eye glasses.  I received quite a few unexpected compliments.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Amazing goes on easy and shows

reviews.headline: So much sparkle
reviews.comments: Love it. No notes.

reviews.headline: Lavender luvr
reviews.comments: The glitter is big but if youre into that, its fine. Mostly purple/blue glitter. It was this or the rare highlighter but rare breaks when its dropped? I dropped this one within 5 minutes of opening it & its still fine.

reviews.headline: Misleading
reviews.comments: Sooo the first and last product on dark skin? Why not the other options? & how can we as women who are dark skin & brown skin see how the other colors look on us?

reviews.headline: Barely showing any pink glow
reviews.comments: Barely showing any pink glow nothing like the AD picture

reviews.headline: Packaging not good
reviews.comments: Love the product, but the lid already came off

reviews.headline: Updated Formula Sucks
reviews.comments: I am not sure what makes the newer shades different formula wise, but 'PINK ICE' is extremely gritty feeling and not nearly as high impact compared to the original 'HOW MANY CARATS'. The shade is beautiful but I need to pile on the highlighter for it to show.

reviews.headline: Review from a non-highlighter girl
reviews.comments: Yes, I brighten my face with concealer - but I avoid highlighter because Im over 50 and highlighters emphasize fine lines wrinkles and texture. But this fenty - its a blinding sparkle - like a wet topper that you can put over anything.

reviews.headline: Goddess Glow
reviews.comments: Beautiful radiant shimmer for the goddess! Multiple comments!

reviews.headline: so pretty
reviews.comments: absolutely stunning finish and i get multiple compliments on how sparkly my nose is lol. i do recommend using a good setting spray because it does transfer easily

reviews.headline: Pink Ice
reviews.comments: I bought this in Pink Ice and it barely shows up.  Like another reviewer said, the new colors seem to be a different formula.  Save your money and buy Half Magi glitter puck instead.

reviews.headline: These are really finicky to use
reviews.comments: They move around the base makeup if you aren't extremely gentle

reviews.headline: Looks good on my melanin skin!
reviews.comments: Adds a nice touch when wearing outfits that show off your dÃ©colletage and shoulders. After showering I'll put on a body highlighter or body oil and then finish off with the Diamond Veil. Chefs Kiss. I went back and bought one for my bestie.

reviews.headline: Ummm
reviews.comments: I got the two new fenty. Trophy wife and levender. Idk why its different from my old how many carats. My ild highlighter has a lot more glitter while this new ones dont and the to swatch them is hard and barely shows. Idk if it is a dofferent formula that how many carats but i prefer that one. Also my levender came with bumps and when i swatch itbarely shows. I really was expecting better since i love fenty beauty

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: I love this product. Great shine and long lasting!

reviews.headline: Instant Purchase!
reviews.comments:
for a girl who loves all things sparkly, please buy this! ran into ulta and this is one of the first things i ran into, the packaging caught my attention immediately, and right after i rubbed some of the try on onto my arm, i grabbed the last one to buy! 
i got the shade "how many carats?!" and it is so so beautiful. will be using this entire thing and repurchasing ðŸ©µ

reviews.headline: The Best Highlighter EVER!
reviews.comments: I have and have tested TONS of highlighters and THIS has got to be one of the top 3 HANDS DOWN! Yeah, I have used alot of them and this is awesome cause I can use it as a topper on my eyelids too and it looks absolutely STUNNING! The way it looks, no company can duplicate even when they have tried. I've tried those too and it is close BUT still not the same! So, if you are thinking about it, then it is worth every penny. I have a mini in one shade and a full size in another and I will be panning both of them for sure!

reviews.headline: I loved it 10/10
reviews.comments: So sparkly and beautiful on the skin. Would definitely recommend!

faceoff_positive.comments:
First the packaging itself is heavy and beautiful, the mirror is so nice inside, I carefully carry it around in a make up bag (cause I've noticed other people saying it's delicate and can break easily if dropped) but as far as that I've had no complications with it breaking apart or falling apart. I actually bought this before it began trending again and I noticed it's been sold out everywhere lately. This product feels soft to the touch and bouncy, my favorite thing about it is you can make it blinding or you can do it like me and just very gently pat on the product for a subtle sheen glitter that reflects in different hues of lighting. It's not like an everyday highlighter unless you're into glitter. I am though, so it works for me- I bounce between glam highlight to a crÃ¨me based glow within highlight for those no make up make up days. 

The thing about this is yes it's expensive, but it's a lot of product. And if I think about it I've never finished a single highlighter I've had so this will last me forever. It's huge! I use this for my highlight, my eye lids, body you name it. I love it because it's night a metallic shine but a transparent based glitter so the glitter really does it's job in sunlight or lowlight versus just a thick dry patch of metallic shine on your face. 

I want this in every shade I love it that much. It's a hard tie for me between how many carats and royal icing (a subtle gold). But I want it badly in rose rave and cognac candy!
faceoff_positive.headline: My favorite highlighter invented

faceoff_negative.comments: ive bought two of these in the last 6 months, the quality and pigment of the highlighter is amazing. it gives a beautiful glow but the packaging is incredibly cheap for the price. Both of my fenty bombs have fallen out of the packaging and been thrown away/ broken. After a few weeks it just falls out of the packaging. Even trying to put it back in leaves a mess all over your hands. The quality of the actual product is amazing, but having to waste nearly 100 dollars on 2 of these just for them to break less than a month of having both of this isnt worth the stress of it. Most likely wont purchase again especially since i probably wont even be able to get a refund / exchange for a new one from Ulta or Fenty
faceoff_negative.headline: Good only if you can afford to keep buying
